mapper.select: SELECT mS.id AS subitemId, mS.subitem_name AS subitemName, mM.id AS capabilityId, mM.name AS capabilityName, mS.semester AS semester, mR.id AS recordId, mR.description1 AS description1, CASE WHEN mR.id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS done FROM _sw_mileage_subitem AS mS INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_category AS mC ON mS.category_id = mC.id LEFT JOIN _sw_category_milestone AS mCM ON mC.id = mCM.category_id LEFT JOIN _sw_milestone AS mM ON mCM.milestone_id = mM.id INNER JOIN _sw_mileage_record AS mR ON mR.subitem_id = mS.id WHERE mR.snum = #{studentId} AND mR.semester = #{currentSemester} ORDER BY mM.name, mS.regdate
